author: Masius, Hector Gottfried, 1653-1709
title: Dissertatio theologica de profanatione hostiæ consecratæ quam occasione facti, quod non ita pridem contigit, impii & blasphemi, breviter ex tempore conscriptam, publicè ventilandam exhibet Hector Gottfried Masiua ... respondente Georgio Christiano Bræmer
